title: Patrick Bond pt 1: Naïve Market Solutions for Climate Change Will Intensify the Looting of Africa
itunes:title: Patrick Bond pt 1: Naïve Market Solutions for Climate Change Will Intensify the Looting of Africa
description: Patrick Bond, sociology professor at the University of Johannesburg, South Africa, discusses the urgent need for climate reparations for Africa, in light of the COP26 climate summit, and why market solutions will not work to address the problems Africa is currently facing. Part 1 of 2.
